mapper.select: /*blog 详细页*/ select * from t_blog where id = #{id}

/*模糊查询*/ select b.id, b.title, b.update_time, b.recommend, b.published, b.type_id, t.id typeid, t.name typename from t_blog b ,t_type t
b.type_id = t.id /*博客类型id=类型id*/
and b.user_id = #{u_id} /*非管理员 查询自己的blog */
and b.type_id = #{blog.typeId} /*根据博客类型查询*/
and b.recommend = #{blog.recommend} /*根据博客推荐查询*/
and b.title like #{pattern} /*根据博客title模糊查询*/

select b.id, b.title, b.first_picture, b.views, b.update_time, b.description, t.name typename, t.id typeid, u.nickname, u.avatar from t_blog b, t_type t, t_user u where b.type_id = t.id and u.id = b.user_id and b.type_id = #{typeId} order by b.update_time desc

select b.id, b.title, b.first_picture, b.views, b.update_time, b.description, b.tag_ids, a.id tagid, a.name tagname, t.id typeid, t.name typename, u.nickname, u.avatar from t_blog b, t_tag a, t_type t, t_user u where b.tag_ids like #{t_tagid} and a.name=#{tagName} and u.id = b.user_id order by b.update_time desc
select DATE_FORMAT(b.update_time, '%Y') from t_blog b order by b.update_time desc
select b.title, b.update_time, b.id, b.flag from t_blog b where DATE_FORMAT(b.update_time, '%Y') = #{year} order by b.update_time desc

/*博客详情*/ select b.id, b.first_picture, b.flag, b.title, b.content, b.views, b.update_time,b.commentabled, b.share_statement, b.appreciation, u.nickname, u.avatar, tag.id tagid, tag.name tagname from t_blog b, t_user u, t_tag tag, t_blog_tags tb where b.user_id = u.id and tb.blog_id = b.id and tb.tag_id = tag.id and b.id = #{id}

/* 首页blog显示*/ select b.id, b.title, b.first_picture, b.views, b.update_time, b.description, t.name typename, t.id typeid, u.nickname, u.avatar from t_blog b, t_type t, t_user u where b.type_id = t.id and u.id = b.user_id order by b.update_time desc
/* 首页显示推荐排名前10*/ select id, title from t_blog where recommend > 0 order by recommend desc limit 10

select b.id, b.title, b.first_picture, b.views, b.update_time, b.description, t.name typename, u.nickname, u.avatar from t_blog b, t_type t, t_user u where b.type_id = t.id and u.id = b.user_id and (b.title like #{pattern} or b.content like #{pattern}) order by b.update_time desc
